import React from 'react' // DATA Files import dataNavbar from "webapp/common/data/Navbar/main-navbar-data.json"; // Components import { HeaderOne, FooterOne } from 'webapp/common' import PageTitleArt from 'webapp/art/component/PageTitleArt'; import 'webapp/art/style/Art.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const ArtModify = ({ tagline, title, backfont, dash, textBtn, classes }) => { const art = useSelector(state => state.arts.current) console.log(art) return ( <>
) } export default ArtModify
